tic_tac_toe.name: Tic Tac Toe
tic_tac_toe.description: Classic strategy game for two players. First to get three in a row wins!
game_2048.description: Slide numbered tiles to combine them and reach the 2048 tile.
flappy_bird.name: Flappy Bird
flappy_bird.description: Navigate through pipes by tapping to keep the bird flying.
snake.name: Snake
snake.description: Control a growing snake to eat food while avoiding walls and yourself.
memory_game.name: Memory Game
memory_game.description: Test your memory by matching pairs of hidden cards.
brick_breaker.name: Brick Breaker
brick_breaker.description: Destroy bricks with a ball and paddle. Break all bricks to clear the level!
